mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commute ( emp_no, commute, emp_on_off_date, emp_on_time, emp_off_time, createdate, updatedate, create_id, update_id ) VALUES ( #{empNo}, #{commute}, CURDATE(), CURTIME(), NULL, NOW(), NOW(), #{empNo}, #{empNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE commute SET commute = #{commute}, emp_off_time = CURTIME() WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND emp_on_off_date = CURDATE()
mapper.select: SELECT emp_on_time empOnTime, COALESCE(emp_off_time, '') empOffTime FROM commute WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND emp_on_off_date = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(${commuteCode}) FROM commute WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND emp_on_off_date = CURDATE()
SELECT emp_hire_date empHireDate FROM emp_info WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}

SELECT YEAR(emp_on_off_date) year, MONTH(emp_on_off_date) month, TIME_FORMAT(SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(emp_off_time) - TIME_TO_SEC(emp_on_time))), '%H:%i:%s') totalWorkTime FROM commute WHERE YEAR(emp_on_off_date) = #{year} AND emp_no = #{empNo} GROUP BY YEAR(emp_on_off_date), MONTH(emp_on_off_date) ORDER BY YEAR(emp_on_off_date), MONTH(emp_on_off_date);

SELECT YEAR(emp_on_off_date) year, MONTH(emp_on_off_date) month, WEEK(emp_on_off_date) week, TIME_FORMAT(SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(emp_off_time) - TIME_TO_SEC(emp_on_time))), '%H:%i:%s') totalWorkTime FROM commute WHERE YEAR(emp_on_off_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(emp_on_off_date) = #{month} AND emp_no = #{empNo} GROUP BY YEAR(emp_on_off_date), MONTH(emp_on_off_date), WEEK(emp_on_off_date)
